revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Clip of bullets | class = ClipOfBullets | game = Strife | doomednum = 2007 | spawnid = 11 | spawnname = T_CLIP | convid = 179, 173, 177 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→ClipOfBullets
 →[[Classes:BoxOfBullets|BoxOfBullets]] Strife's clip of bullets is the ammunition for the [[Classes:AssaultGun|assault gun]]. A normal clip contains 10 bullets. Not to be confused with Doom's own [[Classes:Clip|bullet clip]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR ClipOfBullets : {{Class|Ammo}} { +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 10 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 250 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackAmount}} 10 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}} 500 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_BLIT" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_CLIPOFBULLETS" // "Clip of Bullets" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_CLIPOFBULLETS" // "You picked up the clip of bullets." States { Spawn: BLIT A -1 Stop } }
